# GearGuard Project - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
GearGuard is a Next.js + Tailwind CSS + MongoDB application with separate frontend and backend structures.

## Structure
- `/frontend` - Next.js 14+ with App Router and Tailwind CSS
- `/backend` - Express.js API server with MongoDB integration

## Development Guidelines
- Frontend runs on port 3000
- Backend API runs on port 5000
- Use environment variables for configuration
- Follow REST API conventions for backend routes
- Use TypeScript for type safety
